name: Create a new customer account with invalid passwords -- @1.4

steps.name: Given I am on the Luma homepage without logged in
And I navigate to the registration page
When I fill in the registration form with invalid "Q1w2e3" or "q1w2e3r4"
And I submit the registration form
Then I should see invalid password warning message and the registration fails

fullName: Luma webshop registration: Create a new customer account with invalid passwords
